about_the_game:
Meet Aiko, a Japanese IT engineer who is burned out and fed up with her life. She decides to take a break and travel to Venice, the city of romance and mystery. There, she is accompanied by Thea, a quirky AI that she created and considers her best friend.

But soon, they stumble upon a dark secret that involves the previous owner of Aiko's hotel and a haunted old mill. As Aiko investigates the mystery, she starts to have terrifying nightmares that blur the line between reality and fantasy. Can she trust her own senses and logic, or is there something more sinister at play?



In this thrilling visual novel adventure game, you will explore Venice from a new perspective and discover what it means to be human through the eyes of an AI programmer. You will face challenging puzzles, sensory illusions, and unexpected plot twists that will keep you on the edge of your seat. Are you ready to enter the world of Venice after Dark?




FEATURES

  • Classic Point'n'Click visual novel game in a mystery crime setting with amazing handanimated scene and animations
  • Exciting day and night gameplay loop: Collect informations during daytime by traveling, talking to people, collecting items and solving puzzles. Master cunning auditive and optical illusions during the nighttime
  • High-Quality audio with complete soundtrack and all characters fully voiced-over
  • Unique sensory gameplay in which the game tests your sensory abilities based on true scientific experiments
  • Compelling logic puzzles like hacking an elevator, X-raying secret spots or piecing together important clues


  • Thrilling fact-fiction storyline including real places in Venice and real historical figures and events
  • Three different endings according to your decision in the storyline
  • Including dynamic weather to experience Venice during sunny days, beautiful evenings, dark nights or even heavy storms
  • Homorous dialogue puzzles and over 10 full-fledged NPCs to discover

Can you unravel the mystery of the Molino Stucky mill?


Our funding partners

name: Venice After Dark

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 2 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GPU with graphics acceleration hardware (OpenGL)
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 3 GHz
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA or AMD graphics
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: A short break in Venice turns into a dangerous adventure! And the mysterious history of a surreal mill becomes a surreal test of existence...Solve the mysterious case around the Stucky family and unravel what it means to be human through the eyes of an AI programmer.
